data.title: Jennifer and I will soon be getting a divorce: Karan Singh Grover
data.meta_description: The News Minute | December 10, 2014 | 08:25 pm IST  Television hunk Karan Singh Grover is splitting with his TV star wife Jennifer Winget.  The two had got marr
data.text:
The two had got married in 2012 and speculations were doing rounds for some time now about the couple heading towards a divorce. Grover recently took to Twitter to confirm the separation.

Grover was earlier married to actress Shraddha Nigam in 2008. He then married Winget, who was his Dil Mill Gaye co-star.

Grover will be soon seen in his debut movie Alone, a horror film, starring opposite Bipasha Basu. A report it India.com states 'news has it that Karan’s alleged proximity with Alone co-star Bipasha Basu has brought a rift between the lovely couple'.
